attributes.action: Pass Legislation for deliveries by HGV's in large Towns and Cities to be effected beyween 2200hrs and 0600hrs ie: at night.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This would keep most of the big vehicles of the roads into these areas during the rush hour, and would also keep roads free of parked HGV's in the daytime, causing congestion. THe HGV drivers would also be able to unload quicker and get to more drops within the driving time allowed to them.
